descripcio: Today: A 20 percent chance of rain after 2pm.  Mostly cloudy, with a high near 42. Southwest wind 16 to 20 mph, with gusts as high as 28 mph.

Tonight: A chance of rain and snow before 8pm, then snow likely.  Cloudy, with a low around 24. West southwest wind 8 to 11 mph.  Chance of precipitation is 70%. New snow accumulation of less than one inch possible.

Saturday: Snow likely, mainly before 11am.  Cloudy, with a high near 36. West wind 7 to 13 mph, with gusts as high as 24 mph.  Chance of precipitation is 60%. New snow accumulation of less than one inch possible.

Saturday Night: A 30 percent chance of snow before 11pm.  Mostly cloudy, with a low around 17. Northwest wind around 5 mph becoming light and variable.  New snow accumulation of less than a half inch possible.

Veterans Day: Snow likely, mainly after 11am.  Mostly cloudy, with a high near 31. Light and variable wind becoming west northwest 5 to 7 mph in the morning.  Chance of precipitation is 60%. New snow accumulation of less than one inch possible.
Sunday Night: A 30 percent chance of snow before 11pm.  Partly cloudy, with a low around 12. Little or no snow accumulation expected.
Monday: Sunny, with a high near 35.
Monday Night: Mostly clear, with a low around 21.
Tuesday: Mostly sunny, with a high near 44.
